title: Which 3 Skins are worth the RP?
body:
So in 2 Days time I'm getting myself 8070 RP (Made up of $50 and $10 Prepaid Cards) and I'm already planning to buy Spirit Guard Udyr so all that's left is to pick 3 Legendary Skins from the ones i have available to buy in the Store at the moment. (Any not listed in the screenshot above i already own) I prefer skins that are worth the money in terms of Splash Art, In-Game Visuals, Sound Quality and ability Particles. What would any of you choose if you were given the opportunity to choose any 3 from the screenshot above?

EDIT: Purchase has been made; Final Boss Veigar, Forecast Janna and Arclight Vel'Koz have been purchased as a result of this thread.

replies.body:
Wait, do you even play these champs? If not why blow the RP on skins you won't use?

Trust me, Don't waste it if you don't need to.
the kayle one is seriously cool
Aww, No love for Corporate Mundo?
That Janna skin.....The joke and taunt are so fun to spam

Teemo cause teemo op. 
Veigar cause that skin looks cool and he's getting buffed.
Nasus cause doge.

Edit: Teemo isn't an option. Go with kayle instead.

Personally for me i want Demonblade Tryndamere as that skin is badass, the other two well that's tough but i'm gonna have to go with Nunu Bot for the amazing laugh and probably Infernal Nasus.

Demonblade Tryndamere and Nunu Bot might get a visual update soon too as they are rather old but who knows when that'll happen.
nunu bot just spam the laugh{{champion:20}}

Who ever you play the most.


I get skins depending how much i play the champion
I like Veigar, Nasus and Noc. It really depends on which ones you would play more frequently
I play all evenly. As a matter of fact i seem to play a specific Champion alot better if i have a Skin enabled on them.

Nasus and Veigar are easy the best 2. Their animations, sounds and even Nasus' Dance are worth the money.

Last pick would be Mundo or Janna.
Personally? I'd pick Kayle, Nasus, and then either Veigar or Nunu.

Veigar, Cho and maybe Kayle.

But really considering during Ocean week, mystery gifting has 2 times the chances of looting a legendary skin, since you have that much RP you might as well just mystery spam, if you have a smurf that is.
Infernal Nasus, Aether Wing Kayle and Final Boss Veigar
